# Todolist

A sample Todo-list app in flutter.

![Todo List APP](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/6271955/418233812-533874c3-b79f-4282-8667-8ef0770b4ae1.jpeg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..PKoBK4rR9iJsYt-4BxAqab6mkCOieNcGGWVm7IhUYBg)

## How to RUN

- Create a public API on [npoint.io](https://www.npoint.io/)
- Set npoint **API URL** on `lib/services/api.dart` like this:

```
final _baseUrl = 'https://api.npoint.io/1e25a45ef715d6db9718';
```

### Learning

- Flutter Widgets
  - ElevatedButton
  - Row
  - Column
  - **ListView**
  - IconButton
  - **TextFormField**
- Form pattern

### Tested on

- Ubuntu 24.10
- Android 10
